name: Detritus: Trashtective
description:
In a world where everything is  made of trash augmented with LEDs you, Raz Berri, are the only one up to the task of tracking down and saving your probably in trouble girlfriend.

Made for the Pompous Trash Game Jam! Please Rate!

Collect clues, talk to witnesses, explore the city of Detritus, and more!! All in the name of love, to uncover the truth behind the disappearance of your Cherry Pi.

Meet... Raz Berri & Cherry Pi 

Our daring protagonist & Our hot alt gf

Belle & Erret

Our humble business owner & Our jolly bar owner

Surprise Modifiers Implemented... Lost and Found

"Use “found” assets (otherwise discarded code, imagery, or sound) in your game".

The "found" assets are all the code we borrowed from people and repurposed art for the credits.

Snap, Crackle, Pop

"Make a game where garbled sound plays a significant role in the game".

A garbled sound plays when you hover over an item you are looking for.

Scrubs Only

"Use a trash/weird control scheme (EG: microphone, press 20 times to jump once, or inverted camera)".

Our trash/weird control schemes range in the 3 part battle that doesn't  explain the rules as well as the invconvenient notebook the players can check.
